items.text: When I study for an exam I know exactly how much effort my parents expect of me.
items.text_de: Wenn ich fuer eine Arbeit lerne, weiss ich ganz genau, wie viel Anstrengung meine Eltern von mir erwarten.

items.text: My parents explain to me that I can ask if I want to understand something better.
items.text_de: Meine Eltern erklaeren mir, dass ich nachfragen kann, wenn ich etwas genauer wissen will.
items.description: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on two new German twin studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9 (6), 787-790
items.description_de: Adaptiert von: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on two new German twin studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9 (6), 787-790

items.text: My parents encourage me to ask questions in class when I didn't understand something.
items.text_de: Meine Eltern ermuntern mich im Unterricht Fragen zu stellen, wenn ich etwas nicht verstanden habe.
items.description: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on two new German twin studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9 (6), 787-790
items.description_de: Adaptiert von: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on two new German twin studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9 (6), 787-790

items.text: When I get a poor grade, my parents complain and demand that I work harder.
items.text_de: Wenn ich eine schlechte Note bekommen habe, schimpfen meine Eltern mit mir und verlangen von mir, mehr zu lernen.
items.description: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on two new German twin studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9 (6), 787-790
items.description_de: Adaptiert von: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on two new German twin studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9 (6), 787-790

items.text: When I get a poor grade my parents threaten me with punishment (like no TV) if I do not promise to work hard in the future to improve my grades.
items.text_de: Wenn ich eine schlechte Note bekommen habe, drohen meine Eltern mir Strafen an (z.B. Fernsehverbot), wenn ich in der naechsten Zeit nicht hart arbeite und meine Leistungen verbessere.
items.description: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on two new German twin studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9 (6), 787-790
items.description_de: Adaptiert von: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on two new German twin studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9 (6), 787-790

items.text: When I get a poor grade, my parents accuse me of thinking about too many other things and not enough about school.
items.text_de: Wenn ich eine schlechte Note bekommen habe, werfen meine Eltern mir vor, zu viele andere Dinge im Kopf zu haben und mich nicht genug um die Schule zu kuemmern.
items.description: Adapted from: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on two new German twin studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9 (6), 787-790
items.description_de: Adaptiert von: Spinath, F. M., & Wolf, H. (2006). CoSMoS and TwinPaW: Initial Report on two new German twin studies. Twin Research and Human Genetics, 9 (6), 787-790

pas0200m.question: pas0200m
pas0200m.name: pas0200m
pas0200m.label: How often do the following things usually happen between you and [name mother]?

items.text: How often do the following things usually happen between you and [name mother]?
items.text_de: Im Folgenden moechte ich Dich ein paar Dinge zu Dir und Deiner Familie fragen. Wir fangen an mit Fragen zu Deiner Mutter [Name]. Es gibt keine richtigen und falschen Antworten, bitte sag mir einfach, wie Du darueber denkst. Wie haeufig kommen folgende Dinge typischerweise zwischen Dir und Deiner Mutter [Name] vor?
items.description: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3 ; [[URL link]](http://www.pairfam.de/fileadmin/user_upload/redakteur/publis/Dokumentation/Manuals/Scales_Manual_en_pairfam_3.0.pdf)
items.description_de: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

items.text: Your mother shows you that she likes you.
items.text_de: Deine Mutter zeigt Dir, dass sie Dich gerne hat.
items.description: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3 ; [[URL link]](http://www.pairfam.de/fileadmin/user_upload/redakteur/publis/Dokumentation/Manuals/Scales_Manual_en_pairfam_3.0.pdf)
items.description_de: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

items.text: Your mother praises you.
items.text_de: Deine Mutter lobt Dich.
items.description: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3 ; [[URL link]](http://www.pairfam.de/fileadmin/user_upload/redakteur/publis/Dokumentation/Manuals/Scales_Manual_en_pairfam_3.0.pdf)
items.description_de: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

items.text: Your mother tries to cheer you up when you are sad.
items.text_de: Deine Mutter troestet Dich, wenn Du traurig bist.
items.description: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3 ; [[URL link]](http://www.pairfam.de/fileadmin/user_upload/redakteur/publis/Dokumentation/Manuals/Scales_Manual_en_pairfam_3.0.pdf)
items.description_de: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

items.text: Your mother gives you advice regarding your personal problems.
items.text_de: Deine Mutter unterstuetzt Dich, wenn Du ein Problem hast.
items.description: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3 ; [[URL link]](http://www.pairfam.de/fileadmin/user_upload/redakteur/publis/Dokumentation/Manuals/Scales_Manual_en_pairfam_3.0.pdf)
items.description_de: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

items.text: Your mother punishes you when you do something against her will.
items.text_de: Deine Mutter bestraft Dich, wenn Du etwas gegen ihren Willen tust.
items.description: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3 ; [[URL link]](http://www.pairfam.de/fileadmin/user_upload/redakteur/publis/Dokumentation/Manuals/Scales_Manual_en_pairfam_3.0.pdf)
items.description_de: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

items.text: Your mother is disappointed and sad because you misbehaved.
items.text_de: Deine Mutter ist enttaeuscht und traurig, wenn Du Dich schlecht benommen hast.
items.description: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3 ; [[URL link]](http://www.pairfam.de/fileadmin/user_upload/redakteur/publis/Dokumentation/Manuals/Scales_Manual_en_pairfam_3.0.pdf)
items.description_de: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

items.text: Your mother makes it clear to you that you are not to break the rules or question her decisions.
items.text_de: Deine Mutter gibt Dir zu verstehen, dass Du Dich ihren Anordnungen nicht widersetzen sollst.
items.description: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3 ; [[URL link]](http://www.pairfam.de/fileadmin/user_upload/redakteur/publis/Dokumentation/Manuals/Scales_Manual_en_pairfam_3.0.pdf)
items.description_de: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

items.text: Your mother yells at you because you did something wrong.
items.text_de: Deine Mutter schreit Dich an, wenn Du etwas falsch gemacht hast.
items.description: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3 ; [[URL link]](http://www.pairfam.de/fileadmin/user_upload/redakteur/publis/Dokumentation/Manuals/Scales_Manual_en_pairfam_3.0.pdf)
items.description_de: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

items.text: Your mother scolds you because she is angry at you.
items.text_de: Deine Mutter beschimpft Dich, wenn sie wuetend auf Dich ist.
items.description: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3 ; [[URL link]](http://www.pairfam.de/fileadmin/user_upload/redakteur/publis/Dokumentation/Manuals/Scales_Manual_en_pairfam_3.0.pdf)
items.description_de: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

items.text: When you make new friends, your mother talks to you about them.
items.text_de: Wenn Du neue Freunde hast, unterhaelt sich Deine Mutter mit Dir ueber diese Freunde.
items.description: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3 ; [[URL link]](http://www.pairfam.de/fileadmin/user_upload/redakteur/publis/Dokumentation/Manuals/Scales_Manual_en_pairfam_3.0.pdf)
items.description_de: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

items.text: When you make new friends, your mother gets to know them soon thereafter.
items.text_de: Wenn Du neue Freunde hast, lernt Deine Mutter diese auch bald kennen.
items.description: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3 ; [[URL link]](http://www.pairfam.de/fileadmin/user_upload/redakteur/publis/Dokumentation/Manuals/Scales_Manual_en_pairfam_3.0.pdf)
items.description_de: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

items.text: Your mother threatens you with a punishment but does not actually follows through.
items.text_de: Deine Mutter droht Dir eine Strafe an, straft Dich dann aber doch nicht.
items.description: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3 ; [[URL link]](http://www.pairfam.de/fileadmin/user_upload/redakteur/publis/Dokumentation/Manuals/Scales_Manual_en_pairfam_3.0.pdf)
items.description_de: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

items.text: Your mother finds it hard to set and keep consistent rules for you.
items.text_de: Deiner Mutter faellt es schwer, in ihrer Erziehung konsequent zu sein (z.B. auf die Einhaltung von vereinbarten Regeln oder Verbote zu achten).
items.description: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3 ; [[URL link]](http://www.pairfam.de/fileadmin/user_upload/redakteur/publis/Dokumentation/Manuals/Scales_Manual_en_pairfam_3.0.pdf)
items.description_de: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

tsp0400_2.label: Are you sometimes unable to tell the twins apart?

items.text: Are you sometimes unable to tell the twins apart?
items.text_de: Haben Sie selbst die Zwillinge im fruehen Kindesalter verwechselt? Sofern ein neuer Partner/Stiefelternteil angibt, die Zwillinge im Kindesalter noch nicht gekannt zu haben, dann bitte "weiss nicht" eingeben.
items.description: Item developed for TwinLife
items.description_de: Fuer TwinLife entwickeltes Item

items.text: What about you?
items.text_de: Wie ist es bei Dir?
items.description: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: Would you say that you are NEVER angry, SOMETIMES angry or VERY OFTEN angry?
items.text_de: Wuerdest du sagen, dass du NIE wuetend bist, MANCHMAL wuetend bist oder GANZ OFT wuetend bist?
items.description: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: Would you say that you NEVER listen to your parents, SOMETIMES listen to your parents or VERY OFTEN listen to your parents?
items.text_de: Wuerdest Du sagen, dass du NIE auf Deine Eltern hoerst, MANCHMAL auf Deine Eltern hoerst oder GANZ OFT auf Deine Eltern hoerst?
items.description: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: Would you say that you NEVER have arguments with other children, SOMETIMES have arguments with other children or VERY OFTEN have arguments with other children.
items.text_de: Wuerdest Du sagen, dass Du Dich NIE mit anderen Kindern streitest, MANCHMAL mit anderen Kindern streitest, oder GANZ OFT mit anderen Kindern streitest?
items.description: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: Would you say that you NEVER cheat or lie, sometimes cheat or lie, or very often cheat or lie?
items.text_de: Wuerdest Du sagen, dass Du NIE mogelst oder luegst, MANCHMAL mogelst oder luegst, oder GANZ OFT mogelst oder luegst?
items.description: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

sre0500.question: sre0500
sre0500.name: sre0500
sre0500.label: What about you and [name of other twin]?

items.text: What about you and [name of other twin]?
items.text_de: Wie ist es bei Dir und [Name des anderen Zwillings]?
items.description: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.text: What about doing nice things like helping or doing favors for [name of other twin]? How often do you do these kind of things?
items.text_de: Manche Kinder tun fuer ihre Geschwister etwas Nettes wie z.B. ihnen zu helfen oder ihnen einen Gefallen zu tun. Wie oft tust Du solche netten Dinge fuer [Name des anderen Zwillings]?
items.description: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.text: Most children are affectionate with their brother or sister sometimes even though they fight at other times. How often are you physically affectionate with [name of other twin] (such as by hugging, kissing, holding hands)?
items.text_de: Manche Kinder gehen liebevoll mit ihrem Bruder/ihrer Schwester um, auch wenn sie manchmal streiten. Wie oft bist Du liebevoll/zaertlich zu [Name des anderen Zwillings], z.B. indem Du ihn/sie umarmst, kuesst oder seine/ihre Hand haeltst?
items.description: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.text: How about if [name of other twin] is hurt or upset, how often do you try to make [target sibling] feel better?
items.text_de: Wie ist das, wenn [Name des anderen Zwillings] sich wehgetan hat oder traurig ist, wie oft versuchst Du [Name des anderen Zwillings] zu troesten?
items.description: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.text: Some children share secrets with their brothers and sisters and other children don't. How often do you share secrets with [name of other twin]?
items.text_de: Kinder haben manchmal Geheimnisse. Wie oft erzaehlst Du [Name des anderen Zwillings] Deine Geheimnisse?
items.description: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.text: Brothers and sisters sometimes cause trouble or start fights or arguments with one another, even if they love each other a lot. How often would you say that you start fights or cause trouble for [name of other twin]?
items.text_de: Brueder und Schwestern fangen manchmal einen Streit oder eine Rauferei miteinander an, auch wenn sie sich eigentlich sehr lieb haben. Was wuerdest Du sagen, wie oft zettelst Du einen Streit an oder bringst [Name des anderen Zwillings] in Schwierigkeiten?
items.description: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.text: How often do you feel mad or angry at [name of other twin]?
items.text_de: Wie oft bist Du boese oder wuetend auf [Name des anderen Zwillings]?
items.description: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.text: Children sometimes hurt their brother or sister on purpose like by pushing, punching or hitting him or her. How often do you do these kind of things to [name of other twin]?
items.text_de: Kinder tun ihren Geschwistern manchmal absichtlich weh, indem sie sie z.B. schubsen, hauen oder kneifen. Wie oft machst Du so etwas bei [Name des anderen Zwillings]?
items.description: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.text: Some children are mean to their brothers or sisters sometimes, even if they really care about them. How often would you say you do things to [name of other twin] like tease, bug or call him or her names?
items.text_de: Manche Kinder sind manchmal gemein zu ihrem Bruder/ihrer Schwester, auch wenn sie ihn/sie wirklich lieb haben. Was wuerdest Du sagen, wie oft tust Du solche Dinge, wie [Name des anderen Zwillings] aergern, oder sie/ihn aufzuziehen?
items.description: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.text: Many kids complain that their mothers aren't fair about how they treat them compared to how their mothers treat their brothers and sisters. How is this for you? How often do you feel that your mother treats [name of other twin] better than she treats you?
items.text_de: Manche Kinder beschweren sich darueber, dass ihre Muetter sie und ihren Bruder/ihre Schwester nicht gleich behandeln. Wie ist das bei Dir? Wie oft hast Du das Gefuehl, dass Deine Mutter [Name des anderen Zwillings] besser behandelt als Dich?
items.description: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.text: How about with your father? How often do you feel that he treats [name of other twin] better than he treats you?
items.text_de: Wie ist es mit Deinem Vater? Wie oft hast Du das Gefuehl, dass er [Name des anderen Zwillings] besser behandelt als Dich?
items.description: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.text: How about with your mother? How often do you feel sort of jealous about your mother's attention or affection toward [name of other twin]?
items.text_de: Wie ist es mit Deiner Mutter? Wie oft fuehlst Du so etwas wie Eifersucht, wenn Deine Mutter [Name des anderen Zwillings] Aufmerksamkeit oder Zuneigung schenkt?
items.description: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.text: How about with your father? How often do you feel sort of jealous about your father's attention or affection toward [name of other twin]?
items.text_de: Wie ist es mit Deinem Vater? Wie oft fuehlst Du so etwas wie Eifersucht, wenn dein Vater [Name des anderen Zwillings] Aufmerksamkeit oder Zuneigung schenkt?
items.description: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
